Body:
Description: Hi,

Recently we noticed that EPP agent creates an Outbound Block QUIC rule in the local Windows FW on the endpoint. Apparently this has been a thing forever and went unnoticed.

Can you please confirm why EPP needs to create local Firewall rule? and If not necessary can we disable this process?

I am attaching the document with screenshot showinf that the EPP agent created local firewall on the host.

Thanks,
Parin
Eduard mentioned he will check internally before getting back to the customer.

What We've Learned Updated: the customer needs to know if we have a block rule for the QUIC protocol. As far as the documentation is concerned I only found a bug fix for Brave browser that indicates that there is one for Chrome and Edge.
I will seek confirmation from engineering.
Next Steps Updated: opening an R&D ticket for the question.
Next Steps Updated: waiting for an answer in the Teams group and tomorrow I am opening an R&D ticket for the question if I have no answer.
